Today in Donegal, it's looking great with 3 ft @ 11s W swell and light 5 mph ENE winds. Magheroaty Beach and Mageroaty are your top picks, both holding clean lines throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 2 ft @ 10s W with fresh 13 mph E winds, making it a bit choppy but still surfable at sheltered spots. The day after, conditions improve slightly with 2 ft @ 10s WNW and lighter winds at 9 mph ESE, providing a fun session at spots like Magheroaty. Best: today.
